# Crystal Shield (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 0 feet

**Target:** Your Shield of the Seraphim

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 56

This spell is cast upon a Shield of the Seraphim created by you (see the discipline in Chapter One: Classes of the Book of Experimental Might I). You summon a mass of magical crystal that becomes a part of your Shield of the Seraphim, adding +2 to the Armor Class bonus that it provides.

Further, the *crystal shield* reflects all Eldritch Bolts hurled at you back at the attacker, using the same attack roll and inflicting the same damage.
